text: Sathai munaphikaharula'i chutya'unaka nimti pani josanga bhaniyo ki a'u allahako margama yud'dha gara athava kaphiraharuko akramanala'i roka. Ta bhanna thale ki yadi hamila'i yud'dhabare thaha bha'eko bha'e, hami avasya nai timro satha dine thi'em . Tyasadina yiniharu imanako damjoma kuphrako najika thi'e. Aphno mukhale tiniharule ti kuraharu bhandachan juna tinaka hrdayama chainan. Ra yinale jeâ€“jati kura luka'umchan, allahala'i tyasabare sabai ramrari thaha cha
